content: original japanese name かぎ針編みの ルームシューズ *kagibari ami no rūmu shūzu* direct link to pattern pdf 1 or from the pattern page scroll down to the pdf icon underneath the photo pattern is entirely in japanese but charted **size** ---- these crocheted shoes have a finished size of approx 22cm according to the pattern they should fit a 23cm foot **gauge** ---- gauge is not listed in the pattern but it calls for japanese size 7/0 4 0 mm hook **yarn** ---- there s no yarn information other than that you should use about 70 grams of dk weight yarn based on cotton yarns of this size i estimate 70g would be approx 128 33 meters 140 34 yards 1 https //clover co jp/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/test_recipe_no44_01 pdf
